package.name: Modern Bubbling
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
A nice theme with lots of variants.

This package contains two variants: plain Modern Bubbling and Compact version, which allows to group consecutive messages into a single message bubble.

This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=3629
